message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a unique opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to start with an offer of $180.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer you the product for $160. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a decision soon.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'll offer you the product for $155. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $150. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort you've put in to negotiate with me.
